医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Insilico Medicine 与复星医药交付第二个实体瘤治疗临床前候选药物Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能（AI）驱动的药物发现公司，于2024年6月与复星医药合作成功交付了第二个临床前候选化合物（PCC），这是一种潜在的创新治疗药物治疗实体瘤的合成致死策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Insilico-Medicine-and-Fosun-Pharma-deliver-second-preclinical-candidate-for-solid-tumor-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Insilico-Medicine-and-Fosun-Pharma-deliver-second-preclinical-candidate-for-solid-tumor-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c36eaff6-2113-489e-bc8a-2e9888522f96 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 12:57:00 -0400 Insilico Medicine and Fosun Pharma deliver second preclinical candidate for solid tumor treatment
专家就阿尔茨海默氏症恢复力中的性别和性别差异发表共识声明由巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 领导的国际专家小组已就以下问题达成共识：性别和性别在阿尔茨海默氏病恢复力方面的差异，并呼吁将这些差异纳入未来的研究中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Experts- Produce-consensus-statement-on-sex-and-gender-disparities-in-resilience-to-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Experts-product-consensus-statement-on-sex-and-gender-disparities-in-resilience-to-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36b0b2a4-6261-4ed3-bac3-3aecce65a1e4 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 12:49:00 -0400 Experts produce consensus statement on sex and gender disparities in resilience to Alzheimer's
科学家绘制了关键肿瘤抑制基因变化的所有可能结果弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员绘制了一种名为 VHL 的肿瘤抑制基因变化的所有可能结果，这是一项大规模研究工作的第一步，旨在解开与癌症相关的基因中数万个遗传变异的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Scientists-map-all-the-possible-outcomes-of-changes-to-key-tumor-suppressing-gene.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Scientists-map-all-the-possible-outcomes-of-changes-to-key-tumor-suppressing-gene.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f37bfbce-bd3d-4f15-b183-d55899141431 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 12:40:27 -0400 Scientists map all the possible outcomes of changes to key tumor-suppressing gene
刚果民主共和国发现的新型致命MPOX菌株可能在人类中呈指数级传播人们越来越担心刚果民主共和国（刚果民主共和国）东南部爆发由一种新型性传播病毒株引起的致命性腮腺炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/New-deadly-strain-of-mpox-found-in-DRC-could-spread-exponentially-among- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/New-deadly-strain-of-mpox-found-in-DRC-could-spread-exponentially-among- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=263a3e00-3b50-4477-ad60-b28917a2a76c Fri, 05 Jul 2024 11:12:00 -0400 New deadly strain of mpox found in DRC could spread exponentially among humans
肯尼亚增加现代避孕药具的获取以降低孕产妇死亡率肯尼亚卫生部表示，该国正在寻求通过增加刚刚分娩、堕胎或流产的妇女获得现代避孕药具的机会来降低孕产妇死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Kenya-increases-access-to-modern-contraceptives-to-drive-down-maternal-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Kenya-increases-access-to-modern-contraceptives-to-drive-down-maternal-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8996be65-0a13-44e6-9433-bca4e6ac70a3 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 10:58:51 -0400
为什么主动脉瘤会在特定位置形成？血管动脉瘤通常形成的部位从一开始就具有一定的倾向性，即使在健康人中也是如此。波鸿和波恩的医学研究人员进行的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Why-do-aortic-aneurysms-form-in-specific-locations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Why-do-aortic-aneurysms-form-in-specific-locations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82a69a8c-ef57-4673-b859-fff5da9f85a9 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 10:55:25 -0400 Why do aortic aneurysms form in specific locations?
DNA修复突变充当肠癌的开关肠癌细胞能够利用基因开关来调节其生长，以最大限度地提高其生存机会，伦敦大学学院和乌得勒支大学医学中心的研究人员首次观察到这种现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/DNA-repair-mutations-act-as-a-switch-for-bowel-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/DNA-repair-mutations-act-as-a-switch-for-bowel-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03bd20f8-3723-49de-a057-5ce420744ca2 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 10:40:19 -0400 DNA repair mutations act as a switch for bowel cancer
非糖尿病患者使用 CGM 的监管和心理考虑由伦敦大学学院和伯明翰儿童医院的研究人员领导的一项新的叙述性审查发现，缺乏证据证明连续血糖监测仪 (CGM) 在非糖尿病患者 (PNLD) 中的有效使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Regulatory-and-psychological-considerations-of-CGM-use-in-people-not-living-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Regulatory-and-psychological-considerations-of-CGM-use-in-people-not-living-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87a73ecf-686b-41ea-9077-d4f46ac59c70 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 10:31:22 -0400 Regulatory and psychological considerations of CGM use in people not living with diabetes
男婴在子宫内感染后更有可能实现艾滋病毒治愈或缓解研究人员在一项揭示免疫系统性别差异的新研究中表示，女婴比男婴更有可能在怀孕或分娩期间从母亲那里感染艾滋病毒，而男婴也更有可能获得治愈或缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Baby-boys-more-likely-to-achieve-HIV-cure-or-remission-after-in-utero-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Baby-boys-more-likely-to-achieve-HIV-cure-or-remission-after-in-utero-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db02044a-b761-4ba6-babd-dd37616ca227 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 09:42:18 -0400 Baby boys more likely to achieve HIV cure or remission after in-utero infection
城市配置影响欧洲的健康和可持续发展不同城市布局、人类健康和可持续性之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Urban-configuration-impacts-health-and-sustainability-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Urban-configuration-impacts-health-and-sustainability-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61b8d21a-62af-43e8-8815-fc9f66eb97bc Fri, 05 Jul 2024 08:20:00 -0400 Urban configuration impacts health and sustainability in Europe
